name: criptocase
description: This project is currently under development. The development project is not finished yet. To date, implemented: The project assumes the receipt of information about the cryptocurrency, namely the current price, the change in the value of the coin over the last 24 hours, and a calculator that allows you to calculate the value of the coins at the current rate. It is also possible to output data with the help of graphics.
author: Zorg-Moris
